code: export const pricingPlans={monthly:[{name:"Starter",price:1999,description:"Perfect for small businesses and startups",features:["Up to 5 campaigns","Basic AI ad generation","Email support","10GB storage","Core marketing tools"],popular:false},{name:"Professional",price:5999,description:"Ideal for growing marketing teams",features:["Up to 25 campaigns","Advanced AI features","Priority support","100GB storage","All core features","Custom integrations"],popular:true},{name:"Enterprise",price:19999,description:"For large marketing agencies",features:["Unlimited campaigns","Custom AI models","24/7 phone support","Unlimited storage","All features","Dedicated account manager"],popular:false}],yearly:[{name:"Starter",price:19990,description:"Perfect for small businesses and startups",features:["Up to 5 campaigns","Basic AI ad generation","Email support","10GB storage","Core marketing tools"],popular:false},{name:"Professional",price:59990,description:"Ideal for growing marketing teams",features:["Up to 25 campaigns","Advanced AI features","Priority support","100GB storage","All core features","Custom integrations"],popular:true},{name:"Enterprise",price:199990,description:"For large marketing agencies",features:["Unlimited campaigns","Custom AI models","24/7 phone support","Unlimited storage","All features","Dedicated account manager"],popular:false}]};

sourcesContent:
export const pricingPlans = {
  monthly: [
    {
      name: "Starter",
      price: 1999,
      description: "Perfect for small businesses and startups",
      features: [
        "Up to 5 campaigns",
        "Basic AI ad generation",
        "Email support",
        "10GB storage",
        "Core marketing tools",
      ],
      popular: false,
    },
    {
      name: "Professional",
      price: 5999,
      description: "Ideal for growing marketing teams",
      features: [
        "Up to 25 campaigns",
        "Advanced AI features",
        "Priority support",
        "100GB storage",
        "All core features",
        "Custom integrations",
      ],
      popular: true,
    },
    {
      name: "Enterprise",
      price: 19999,
      description: "For large marketing agencies",
      features: [
        "Unlimited campaigns",
        "Custom AI models",
        "24/7 phone support",
        "Unlimited storage",
        "All features",
        "Dedicated account manager",
      ],
      popular: false,
    },
  ],
  yearly: [
    {
      name: "Starter",
      price: 19990,
      description: "Perfect for small businesses and startups",
      features: [
        "Up to 5 campaigns",
        "Basic AI ad generation",
        "Email support",
        "10GB storage",
        "Core marketing tools",
      ],
      popular: false,
    },
    {
      name: "Professional",
      price: 59990,
      description: "Ideal for growing marketing teams",
      features: [
        "Up to 25 campaigns",
        "Advanced AI features",
        "Priority support",
        "100GB storage",
        "All core features",
        "Custom integrations",
      ],
      popular: true,
    },
    {
      name: "Enterprise",
      price: 199990,
      description: "For large marketing agencies",
      features: [
        "Unlimited campaigns",
        "Custom AI models",
        "24/7 phone support",
        "Unlimited storage",
        "All features",
        "Dedicated account manager",
      ],
      popular: false,
    },
  ],
}
